filmography.title: The Woman on the Beach
filmography.role_description: A shell-shocked Coast Guard officer who becomes entangled in a dangerous love triangle with a mysterious woman and her blind husband.
filmography.plot: A Coast Guard officer suffering from battle fatigue falls for a mysterious woman, leading to a dangerous romantic entanglement.

filmography.title: Crossfire
filmography.role_description: A brutal, bigoted soldier whose anti-Semitic hatred leads to a murder investigation; Ryan's breakout, Oscar-nominated performance.
filmography.plot: A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of soldiers just out of the army. Police investigate the motive, which may be anti-Semitism.

filmography.title: Berlin Express
filmography.role_description: An American agricultural expert traveling through post-war Europe who gets drawn into a political assassination plot.
filmography.plot: A group of train passengers in post-WWII Germany become involved in a mystery when a German peace activist is kidnapped.

filmography.title: Act of Violence
filmography.role_description: A crippled, vengeful POW survivor who stalks the former officer who betrayed their unit in a Nazi prison camp.
filmography.plot: An embittered, vengeful POW stalks his former commanding officer who betrayed his men's planned escape attempt from a Nazi prison camp.

filmography.title: The Boy with Green Hair
filmography.role_description: A compassionate child psychiatrist who tries to help a war orphan ostracized for his suddenly green hair.
filmography.plot: A young war orphan wakes up one morning to find his hair has turned green, leading to prejudice from the townspeople.

filmography.title: The Set-Up
filmography.role_description: An aging boxer who refuses to take a dive, unaware that his manager has already bet against him.
filmography.plot: An aging boxer refuses to throw a fight, unaware that his manager has already taken money from a mobster for him to lose.

filmography.title: Caught
filmography.role_description: A sadistic, manipulative millionaire who traps his young wife in a loveless, controlling marriage.
filmography.plot: A young woman marries a wealthy tycoon, but his psychotic control forces her to flee into the arms of a humble doctor.

filmography.title: The Secret Fury
filmography.role_description: A devoted fiancé who helps his bride-to-be uncover the truth when she is accused of bigamy and insanity.
filmography.plot: A pianist's wedding is interrupted by a stranger claiming she is already married to him, plunging her into a mystery.

filmography.title: Flying Leathernecks
filmography.role_description: A compassionate executive officer who clashes with his tough commander (John Wayne) over the treatment of their pilots.
filmography.plot: A tough Marine commander leads his fighter squadron into the Battle of Guadalcanal while clashing with his more lenient executive officer.

filmography.title: The Racket
filmography.role_description: An old-school, violent gangster who finds his brutal methods outdated in the face of a modern, corporate crime syndicate.
filmography.plot: A tough police captain takes on a local crime boss in a city filled with corruption.

filmography.title: On Dangerous Ground
filmography.role_description: A bitter, violent city cop sent to the snowy countryside where he finds redemption through the love of a blind woman.
filmography.plot: A tough city cop is sent to the country to help solve a murder and is softened by the blind sister of the suspect.

filmography.title: Clash by Night
filmography.role_description: A cynical, bitter projectionist who begins an affair with a bored housewife, leading to a volatile love triangle.
filmography.plot: A woman returns home and marries a good-natured fisherman but falls for his cynical friend, leading to domestic conflict.

filmography.title: The Naked Spur
filmography.role_description: A manipulative, charming outlaw who uses psychological warfare to turn his captors against each other.
filmography.plot: A bounty hunter trying to bring a murderer to justice is forced to accept the help of two strangers who are less than trustworthy.

filmography.title: Inferno
filmography.role_description: A wealthy businessman left to die in the desert by his wife and her lover, who fights to survive and seek revenge.
filmography.plot: A millionaire left to die in the desert by his wife and her lover fights for survival and revenge.

filmography.title: Bad Day at Black Rock
filmography.role_description: A menacing town boss who orchestrates a conspiracy of silence to cover up a racially motivated murder.
filmography.plot: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town and uncovers a terrible secret that the citizens will kill to keep.

filmography.title: House of Bamboo
filmography.role_description: A ruthless American gangster leading a crime syndicate in post-war Tokyo, ruling his men with an iron fist.
filmography.plot: In Tokyo, a ruthless gang of American ex-soldiers is infiltrating the local underworld.

filmography.title: Men in War
filmography.role_description: A weary platoon leader in the Korean War who must join forces with a renegade sergeant to get his men to safety.
filmography.plot: During the Korean War, a lieutenant and a sergeant must work together to save their platoon from enemy forces.

filmography.title: God's Little Acre
filmography.role_description: A deluded, obsessive patriarch who digs up his farm searching for gold instead of planting crops.
filmography.plot: A dirt-poor Georgia farmer is obsessed with finding gold on his land, neglecting his family and farm.
filmography.awards: Venice Film Festival: Nomination – Golden Lion

filmography.title: Day of the Outlaw
filmography.role_description: A ruthless cattleman whose feud with homesteaders is interrupted when a gang of outlaws takes the town hostage.
filmography.plot: A rancher and his rival must put aside their differences when a gang of outlaws takes over their snowbound town.

filmography.title: Odds Against Tomorrow
filmography.role_description: An aging, bigoted ex-con hired for a bank heist, whose racism causes fatal friction within the crew.
filmography.plot: A desperate ex-cop, an indebted nightclub singer, and a racist ex-con team up to rob a bank.

filmography.title: King of Kings
filmography.role_description: The fiery prophet who preaches the coming of the Messiah and baptizes Jesus in the Jordan River.
filmography.plot: The life story of Jesus Christ from his birth in Bethlehem to his crucifixion and resurrection.

filmography.title: Billy Budd
filmography.role_description: A sadistic master-at-arms whose cruelty and obsession with the innocent Billy Budd leads to tragedy.
filmography.plot: In the British Navy of 1797, a naive young sailor is persecuted by a sadistic master-at-arms.

filmography.title: The Professionals
filmography.role_description: A horse specialist and part of an elite team hired to rescue a wealthy rancher's kidnapped wife.
filmography.plot: An American oil tycoon hires four professionals to rescue his kidnapped wife from a Mexican bandit.

filmography.title: The Dirty Dozen
filmography.role_description: A rigid, by-the-book colonel who clashes with Lee Marvin's unorthodox command of the convict squad.
filmography.plot: A rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

filmography.title: The Wild Bunch
filmography.role_description: A former outlaw partner of the gang leader who is forced by the law to hunt down his old friends.
filmography.plot: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the 'traditional' American West disappears around them.

filmography.title: The Iceman Cometh
filmography.role_description: A cynical, former anarchist awaiting death who serves as a Greek chorus in O'Neill's play; Ryan's final film performance.
filmography.plot: A traveling salesman visits a run-down saloon and tries to convince the patrons to give up their pipe dreams.
filmography.awards: Special NBR Award: Best Acting Ensemble
